snippet: The inventory increase reflected a 0.8 percent rise in stockpiles of durable goods, with auto inventories rising 1.2 percent and furniture up 1.5 percent.
abstract: Commerce Dept says stockpiles at wholesale level increased 0.3 percent in September after 0.6 percent rise in August; sales by wholesalers rose 0.2 percent in September after sharp 0.8 percent August decline.
lead_paragraph: The inventory increase reflected a 0.8 percent rise in stockpiles of durable goods, with auto inventories rising 1.2 percent and furniture up 1.5 percent.

headline.main: U.S. Wholesalers’ Stockpiles and Sales Rose in September
headline.print_headline: U.S. Wholesalers’ Stockpiles and Sales Rose in September
